revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Adtran |model=1004W |revision=B |fcc_date=09/26/2017 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, fiber gateway, ONT |fcc_id=HDC1004W, TOUC1004W |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, SFP+, |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |wi1_module=UbiQuoss WM203 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=UbiQuoss WM202 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1442 P20, 424964 3 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=EPON, TR-069, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
"ubiQuoss C1004W Ver2.5" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :FCC ID HDC1004W is a change in ID request from TOUC1004W.
